text: Marian Kociniak (11 January 1936 - 17 March 2016) was a Polish movie and theatre actor. He was known for his role in the 1970 movie How I Unleashed World War II. He was born in Warsaw, Poland. Kociniak died in Warsaw, Poland from a heart attack on 17 March 2016 at the age of 80. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1936 births Category:2016 deaths Category:Deaths from myocardial infarction Category:Polish movie actors Category:Polish stage actors Category:People from Warsaw
title: Marian Kociniak
